title: Ep 111 | Jase & Jep's New Show, Phil's 'Duck Dynasty' Prediction & the Greatest Defense Lawyer Ever
description:
Jase and Jep are working on a new show, and Jase wants you to vote on the concept. Phil isn't sure about the show, but then again, he didn't think Americans would watch "Duck Dynasty." Jep and Jase explain the very different reasons they love metal detecting. Phil reveals one reason he's so proud of all five of his children. Phil and Jase discuss the only defense lawyer they trust. And Jep is in the studio to thank Unashamed Nation for supporting All God's Children International.

Vote on Jase & Jep's new show: https://www.facebook.com/DasherZach/  

Learn more about All God's Children International: https://allgodschildren.org/

Learn more about Alliance Defending Freedom: https://www.adflegal.org/

Pre-order Jesus Politics by Phil Robertson: http://jesuspoliticsbook.com

HomeTitleLock.com and enter PHIL 

ScoreMaster.com/PHIL 

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX
 
See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
 
To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
